content.name: Jheng-Hao Lin
education: Bachelor of Landscape Design, National Taiwan University
Studying BSc Computer Science in Goldsmiths, University of London
content.shortProfile: A technology enthusiast with two web development internship experiences and two years working experience in creative domain industry as a freelancer and company co-founder. Now pursuing the computer science degree out of passion and enthusiasm for technology. Consider test-driven development essential and care about coding style. Praised for the ability to plan and lead a development project and manage the heavy workload. Possess recognized skills in problem-solving between employers and lecturers at University. A strong sense of aesthetics shows in the website portfolio and projects.
